Texts.Eng: Ah, most exceptional, fleshling. My gratitude showers upon you, and the glory of the Shards will shine on your soul forevermore.
Bring a ^orange;Crystalline Trophy^reset; to the ^green;Gem Shop^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Good day, being of carbon and flesh. I wonder if you might give aid to this Eld'uukhar? I seek the glorious aspect of a ^orange;Crystalline Trophy^reset;. I've heard that they can be found in ^orange;Ancient Temples^reset;. If you find one, I would reward you handsomely for your efforts.
